PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-09952010-08-04,  ,  ,  JUS, 
ActJudges Act
SubjectRomain W. M. Pitt ** RETIREMENTAND ANNUITY **
PrecisRetirement and granting of a lifelong annuity to the Hon. ROMAIN W. M. PITT, a Judge of the Superior Court of Justice in and for the Province of Ontario, effective September 29, 2010.
AttachmentsAttachment
